title: Is Tiger's Scandal Still Looming Over Him?

brightcove_long_desc: Golf Magazine's Jessica Marksbury hosts Sports Illustrated's Alan Shipnuck and Mark Godich and Golf.com's Mike Walker, who discuss whether Tiger Woods' scandal is still affecting his career five years later.

description: Golf Magazine's Jessica Marksbury hosts Sports Illustrated's Alan Shipnuck and Mark Godich and Golf.com's Mike Walker, who discuss whether Tiger Woods' scandal is still affecting his career five years later.
